author: PTI
title: Former Pakistani cricketer dies of coronavirus
description: Former Pakistani cricketer dies of coronavirusCricketer Zafar Sarfraz first fell ill earlier this month and was put on a ventilator at a Peshawar hospital.
content: KARACHI: Former Pakistani first-class cricketer Zafar Sarfraz became the first professional player in the country to die after contracting the novel coronavirus, his family confirmed Tuesday. The 50-year-old first fell ill earlier this month and was put on a … [+2958 chars]
